query:
SELECT 
  t.id as turma_id,
  t.codigo as turma_codigo,
  COUNT(DISTINCT g.id) as total_grupos,
  COUNT(DISTINCT f.id) as total_formandos
FROM turmas t
LEFT JOIN grupos_briefing g ON g.turmaId = t.id
LEFT JOIN formandos_briefing f ON f.grupoId = g.id
WHERE t.codigo = '654'
GROUP BY t.id, t.codigo;
